problem_text:
Problem 100. Is every group well-approximated by finite groups?
Comments. There are really two questions here, namely is every group sofic? and is every group hyperlinear? Here is a precise statement of the latter question.
Suppose that G is a group.
Is the following true?
For every finite set A ⊂ G containing the identity e_G and for every ε > 0, there is some unitary group U(n)
